member.name: T:MicroPos.CrossPlatform.IInitializer
member.summary: Responsible for setup all functionalities from a specific platform.

member.name: M:MicroPos.CrossPlatform.IInitializer.InitializePlatform
member.summary: Setup all functionalities from a specific platform.

member.name: P:MicroPos.CrossPlatform.IInitializer.Initialized
member.summary: Informs whether the platform was initialized or not.

member.name: M:MicroPos.CrossPlatform.IPinpadFinder.Find
member.summary: Procura um Pinpad pronto para uso. Utiliza um thread para cada porta Serial para agilizar a busca.
member.returns: Uma porta serial aberta de um Pinpad

member.name: M:MicroPos.CrossPlatform.IPinpadFinder.SafeFind
member.summary: Procura um Pinpad pronto para uso. Utiliza um thread para cada porta Serial para agilizar a busca. Continua procurando até encontrar um Pinpad
member.returns: Uma porta serial aberta de um Pinpad

member.name: T:MicroPos.CrossPlatform.PinpadConnectionManager
member.summary: Armazena as Portas Seriais impedindo que elas sejam destruídas pelo garbage collector
